content: I'm adding a new piece of validation to the IG publisher - checking that the search parameter type in Capability.rest.resource.searchParam.type is consistent with that defined in the SearchParameter identified in Capability.rest.resource.searchParam.definition
in my test suite of IGs both SDC and MHD have new errors from this check @Lloyd McKenzie @John Moehrke
Ill take a look. Good to see advancement on the tools for CapabilityStatement
